content: may find the smaller needle works better for the rib to achieve a tighter fitting beanie if you are working with 100% alpaca yarn mmeerriinniiaa mmeennddoozzaa aallmmeeiiddaa hhaatt copyright ©© -- 22002244 bunnymuff 1 bbeeggiinn with colour a and smaller circular needles cast on 52 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts place marker to denote beginning of round work 10 rounds of 2 x 2 rib k2 p2 whatever activities we do the women s children are always close by so the next change to larger needles and k13 m1 x 4 56 sts generation is already participating in conservation in licapa work chart 8 sts remain --merinia mendoza almeida break yarn and pull through remaining sts ffiinniisshhiinngg weave in ends make and attach pom pom optional block and enjoy tux from rock hollow farm mmeerriinniiaa mmeennddoozzaa aallmmeeiiddaa hhaatt copyright ©© -- 22002244 bunnymuff 2
